CONVERSATION GROUP: BK rephrased "At times we must get our hands dirty to weed the garden."

WOTC cut " within the Order"
BK angling -> vying
BK cut ", then this time was not wasted" because it did not feel necessary and was kind of already sstated
BK edited "We targeted your people because we knew you had a past of demonic activity. The evidence bears it forth. By our actions, we have slowed Belaphoss' progress, if not stopped it entirely. "

BK tweaked from "The leadership of the Order of the Gauntlet simply stated their policy: to combat evil in all its forms, but not to strike preemptively when all the facts are not known. A sensible rule, to be sure... but unreasonable in the face of fiends!"

BK from :"We became aware of another group of fiendish servants, and I pushed for us to confront them immediately, but the Order refused. So I gathered a band of knights who felt the way I did, and we dealt with the threat ourselves.
BK - Jay, I started changing Order to Gauntlet some of the time because of all the orders/guilds kicking around. Seems more distinctive. Let me know if you want it changed back

BK tweaked "But they declined to act on that knowledge! So I confronted our leaders. If we had struck out against the devils' minions, we could have stopped the incursion before it started! Many great men would still be alive today!
BK rephrased "But no one prepared us for the image of true death at the hands of fiends.
Bk reprhased "Yes. I can still hear his screams.
BK reprhased: "I am not here to become friends with you. I am here to defeat the demon and protect the Sword Coast. There is nothing to be gained from idle palaver.
BK reprhased from "No. The insights of Helm are not at your beck and call."
BK reprhased: "I suppose if we are to travel in the Underdark together, it would be good for you to understand some of why I do what I do.
BK cut: " as we might believe"
BK Tweaked: "I have seen through your actions that you act according to your convictions. That has been my flaw. My convictions have led me down a path of darkness to protect the light.

BK edited from "The sooner we do, the easier it will be to rout this rebellion, and the sooner we can track down your demon and its minions. It would be to our strategic advantage to clear this potential front of enemies."
BK: original line "What you have done for me is above and beyond what I would have expected from one still mourning loved ones killed by my order.

BK: original "I am a man in conflict, now. On one hand, I am sworn to protect this world from demons, and I sense the demon's hand on your destiny. But on the other, I now know you to be a hero, willing to go out of your way to help others."
BK rewrote from: "Whatever may come, whatever we may be required to do by our respective oaths, know that I no longer see the Abyss' mark on you. You have shown me the truth of your soul.
BK rewrote: "No. This realization comes too late. Too much blood has been spilled because I was blinded by my own fear. A mistake I will not make again."
BK rephrased "At times we must get our hands dirty to weed the garden."
